text: Cornelius Crane "Chevy" Chase (born October 8, 1943) is an American Emmy Award-winning comedian, writer, and actor. He was one of the original cast members on Saturday Night Live. He left after a year. == References == Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:American Emmy Award winners
title: Chevy Chase
